Gperf


GNU gperf is a perfect hash function generator. For a given list of strings, it produces a hash function and hash table, in form of C or C++ code, for looking up a value depending on the input string.

The hash function is /perfect/, which means that the hash table has no collisions, and the hash table lookup needs a single string comparison only.

https://www.gnu.org/software/gperf/

https://archlinux.org/packages/extra/x86_64/gperf/
